statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT amount, description FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, account_id, description FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE description LIKE '%payment%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, account_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, description FROM transaction_records WHERE description ILIKE '%payment%' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY account_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 5000;
SELECT id, description, LENGTH(description) AS description_length FROM transaction_records WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50 ORDER BY description_length ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM encrypted_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, encrypted_data, timestamp FROM encrypted_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, encrypted_data, timestamp FROM encrypted_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, audit_timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY audit_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, encrypted_data FROM encrypted_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_transactions JOIN audit_logs ON encrypted_transactions.transaction_id = audit_logs.transaction_id WHERE audit_logs.audit_timestamp >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT encrypted_data, timestamp FROM encrypted_transactions WHERE encrypted_data LIKE '%credit card%';
SELECT transaction_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM encrypted_transactions GROUP BY transaction_id ORDER BY latest_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_institution;
SELECT id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_institution WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_details, transaction_amount FROM financial_institution ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM financial_institution GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT a.auditor_id, a.auditor_name, t.audit_date FROM auditor a JOIN transaction_audit t ON a.auditor_id = t.auditor_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_institution WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM financial_institution GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transaction_amount > 5000;
SELECT f.id, f.transaction_amount, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM financial_institution f INNER JOIN customer c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT a.auditor_name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM auditor a INNER JOIN transaction_audit t ON a.auditor_id = t.auditor_id GROUP BY a.auditor_name HAVING total_transactions > 10;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, SUM(f.transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer c INNER JOIN financial_institution f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_transactions;
SELECT account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM encrypted_transactions WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT log_timestamp, action_performed FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
